languages.text: Имперский флот попытался насильно завербовать братство механознатцев Ларкина, почтенных изготовителей воздушных машин. Отважные техноматы решили дать отпор, и теперь они нуждаются в броне для своих летающих конструкций.

The Imperial Navy has tried to conscript the fellowship of Mech-Sages on Larcheen, renowned creators of airborne machines, by force. The brave technomats have decided to fight back, and now they require armour for their flying constructs.
languages.original_text: Имперский флот попытался насильно завербовать братство механознатцев Ларкина, почтенных изготовителей воздушных машин. Отважные техноматы решили дать отпор, и теперь они нуждаются в броне для своих летающих конструкций.

traits.locale_text: The Imperial Navy has tried to conscript the fellowship of Mech-Sages of Larcheen, renowned creators of airborne machines, by force. The brave technomats have decided to fight back, and now they require armour for their flying constructs.

The Imperial Navy has tried to conscript the fellowship of Mech-Sages on Larcheen, renowned creators of airborne machines, by force. The brave technomats have decided to fight back, and now they require armour for their flying constructs.

languages.text: La Marine Impériale a tenté d'enrôler de force la communauté des méca-sages de Larcheen, d'éminents créateurs de machines volantes. Les braves technomates ont décidé de résister, mais ont besoin de blindage pour les appareils volants.
languages.original_text: The Imperial Navy has tried to conscript the fellowship of Mech-Sages on Larcheen, renowned creators of airborne machines, by force. The brave technomats have decided to fight back, and now they require armour for their flying constructs.

traits.locale_text: La Marine Impériale a tenté d'enrôler de force la communauté des méca-sages de Larcheen, d’éminents créateurs de machines volantes. Les braves technomates ont décidé de résister, mais ont besoin de blindage pour les appareils volants.

languages.text: 帝国海軍は、空挺機械の製作者として名高いラルチーンのメック・セイジの仲間を力ずくで徴用しようとした。勇敢なテクノマットは反撃に出ることを決意したため、飛行構築物用の装甲を必要としている。
languages.original_text: The Imperial Navy has tried to conscript the fellowship of Mech-Sages on Larcheen, renowned creators of airborne machines, by force. The brave technomats have decided to fight back, and now they require armour for their flying constructs.

traits.locale_text: 帝国海軍は、空挺機械の製作者として名高いラルチーンのメック・セイジの仲間を力ずくで徴用しようとした。勇敢なテクノマットは反撃に出ることを決意したため、飛行構築物用の装甲を必要としている。

languages.text: 帝国海军打算动用武力，征召拉岑岛上的机械贤者联盟，他们是赫赫有名的航空机械制造大师。然而，这些勇敢无畏的技工决定实施反击，他们需要为自己的飞行器加装护甲。
languages.original_text: The Imperial Navy has tried to conscript the fellowship of Mech-Sages on Larcheen, renowned creators of airborne machines, by force. The brave technomats have decided to fight back, and now they require armour for their flying constructs.

traits.locale_text: 帝国海军打过通过武力征召拉岑岛上的机械贤者联盟，他们是赫赫有名的航空机械制造大师。然而，这些勇敢无畏的技工决定实施反击，他们需要为自己的飞行器加装护甲。

languages.text: La Armada Imperial ha intentado reclutar por la fuerza a la hermandad de Mecasabios de Larcheen, renombrados creadores de máquinas aéreas. Los valientes tecnómatas han decidido contraatacar, y ahora necesitan armaduras para sus construcciones voladoras.
languages.original_text: The Imperial Navy has tried to conscript the fellowship of Mech-Sages on Larcheen, renowned creators of airborne machines, by force. The brave technomats have decided to fight back, and now they require armour for their flying constructs.

traits.locale_text: La Armada Imperial ha intentado reclutar por la fuerza a la hermandad de Mecasabios de Larcheen, renombrados creadores de máquinas aéreas. Los valientes tecnómatas han decidido contraatacar, y ahora necesitan armaduras para sus construcciones voladoras.

languages.text: Die Imperiale Kriegsflotte hat versucht, die Bruderschaft der Mech-Weisen auf Larcheen gewaltsam zu rekrutieren, angesehene Erbauer fliegender Maschinen. Die mutigen Technomaten haben beschlossen, sich zur Wehr zu setzen, und benötigen nun Panzerung für ihre fliegenden Konstrukte.
languages.original_text: The Imperial Navy has tried to conscript the fellowship of Mech-Sages on Larcheen, renowned creators of airborne machines, by force. The brave technomats have decided to fight back, and now they require armour for their flying constructs.

traits.locale_text: Die Imperiale Kriegsflotte hat versucht, die Bruderschaft der Mech-Weisen auf Larcheen gewaltsam zu rekrutieren, angesehene Erbauer fliegender Maschinen. Die mutigen Technomaten haben beschlossen, sich zur Wehr zu setzen, und benötigen nun Panzerung für ihre fliegenden Konstrukte.

languages.text: İmparatorluk Donanması, Larcheen'deki Mekâlim cemiyetini zorla saflarına katmaya çalıştı. Kendilerini savunma kararı alan cesur teknomatlar, mucidi oldukları uçan makineler için zırha ihtiyaç duymakta.
languages.original_text: The Imperial Navy has tried to conscript the fellowship of Mech-Sages on Larcheen, renowned creators of airborne machines, by force. The brave technomats have decided to fight back, and now they require armour for their flying constructs.
